title: Dr. Jerry Pournelle accepts 2016 Heinlein Award
author: VD
content_html: Fans of Dr. Pournelle will also likely be interested in this, the first THERE WILL BE WAR hardcover, the 702-page omnibus version of Volumes I and II. We’ll be doing the complete set, so if you’re interested in collecting it, there is no better time to start than now. At least one more omnibus will be published this year, Volumes IX and X, as well as Vols V and VI in ebook.
content_text:
Fans of Dr. Pournelle will also likely be interested in this, the first
THERE WILL BE WAR
hardcover,
the 702-page omnibus version of Volumes I and II
. We’ll be doing the complete set, so if you’re interested in collecting it, there is no better time to start than now. At least one more omnibus will be published this year, Volumes IX and X, as well as Vols V and VI in ebook.
